I lost all my hair, packed on abt 10 kolos due to the cortesone I took. then I was clean for 3 years then it appeared at exactly the same spot as before, this time I got herceptin with Taxotere...lost my hair again and piled on the kilo's again thanks to cortosone again. Then another two years later and this time I am being treated for a mark on my back bone. He got a very high fever from the chemo, was admitted to the hospital, he then was sticked with a needle as big as a stick through his ribcage, and afterwards he was in such pain. His spirit was broken, he came back as a shadow of the guy that went in. I have to agree with you.,. if you feel that your quality of life is being threatened, I would also stop and rather live life everyday as if it was your last one.
